prompt.title: Initial Prompt
prompt.description: The message to send to as prompt for this input.

unrecognizedPrompt.title: Unrecognized Prompt
unrecognizedPrompt.description: The message to send if the last input is not recognized.
examples: Let's try again. What is your birth date?

invalidPrompt.title: Invalid Prompt
invalidPrompt.description: The message to send to when then input was not valid for the input type.

maxTurnCount.title: Max Turn Count
maxTurnCount.description: The max retry count for this prompt.

valueProperty.title: Value Property
valueProperty.description: The property to store the result of the value

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: value to return if the value expression can't be evaluated.

alwaysPrompt.title: Always Prompt
alwaysPrompt.description: If set to true this will always prompt the user regardless if you already have the value or not.

allowInterruptions.title: Allow Interruptions
allowInterruptions.description: If set to true this will always consult the parent dialog whether it will be interupt or not
